Package gr.forth.ics.graph.io

Input/Output utilities for reading/writing graphs.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
GraphReader  
GraphWriter  
 

Class Summary
GraphIO A collection of utilities for reading and writing graphs into various serialization formats.
 

Enum Summary
Format Defines serialization (input and output) formats for graphs.
 

Exception Summary
ParseException Thrown when a parser cannot interpret its input.
 

Package gr.forth.ics.graph.io Description

Input/Output utilities for reading/writing graphs.

See GraphIO class for a set of relevant utilities.
